titleStmt.title: A copy of verses, humbly presented to all his worthy masters and mistrisses in the town of Lambeth. By Thomas Ouldman, belman.
titleStmt.author: Ouldman, Thomas.

notesStmt.note: Verse - "I walk my rounds, kind Sir, as you can tell,".
A collection of short verses on various themes.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
